title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The bug report does not provide any information about the observed behavior.
EB: The expected behavior is that the datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Input 'new Date()' as content for three items.
2. Save the changes.
3. Preview the changes and verify the displayed format of datetime values in the dynamic text, data, and text items.
